name: Don Carlos
description:
Don Carlos

This is a platformer game made for WASM-4. The particularity of the game? You can just create platforms to go by.
To do this you create "minions", which will just go forward and place bricks below them. You can also pick bouncy balls to make your bricks bouncy. And your minions even 'jump' when they're above a bouncy brick.

Controls Destroy brick in front of you
DownMovementLeft and Right
JumpUpApply bouncy ball on brick below youZ/CCreate a minionX
